title: Seabass curry with coconut oil
directions: Rub the fish with the turmeric and a little salt.
Heat the coconut oil and add onion, chillies, garlic and 10 curry leaves. Cook until onions are soft. Season, add coconut milk, simmer. Fry the last leaves separately for garnish.
Pan fry the fish in butter for 6mins or until cooked through. Serve with rice or potatoes mashed with masala powder and curry sauce on top. Naan wrong with that.
